A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: With a lot of the connective tissue to the main trilogy ( and even the prequel trilogy) severed\, The Last Jedi unapologetically steamrolls ahead into new territory. While bold and wildly entertaining\, it makes this viewer far less interested in the next chapter. The Last Jedi wants to be its own thing ; almost like one of the movies in the newly announced Star Wars trilogy dropped a little sooner.
